Stranger (Azuterron NPC)

The Stranger, also known as Azuterron, is a mysterious figure shrouded in black mist who offers a quest to adventurers in the dungeon.

Description

A mysterious figure shrouded by black mist. The Stranger appears as a quest-giver with unique dialogue and a special quest related to defeating a dark creature.

Quest

  • Objective: Defeat the Treacherous Spirit and bring back its Heart of Darkness
  • Offer: In exchange for help, the Stranger offers assistance and a potion as reward
  • Alternative: Necromancers have the option to dominate the spirit instead of slaying it

Dialogue

The Stranger's opening speech: “Huh, why… oh, you see me, don't you? That means you're not one of \”them\“. I see you're not fond of all these monsters as well. Tell you what, if you'll help me out with a little problem, then I will offer you my assistance. Somewhere on this level you will find a beast of darkness, a Treacherous Spirit. Slay it, take it's heart and come back to me. And one more thing, if you are interested in purchasing my supplies, don't hesitate to ask”

Special Mechanics

  • Necromancer Option: Necromancers can use necromancy to dominate the spirit instead of killing it
  • Potion Reward: Provides a useful potion upon quest completion
  • Mysterious Nature: References “them” suggesting a larger story

Location

  • Found on specific dungeon levels (often in connection with the Treacherous Spirit quest)

Related

  • Treacherous Spirit - The target of the quest
  • Heart of Darkness - The quest item to retrieve
  • Necromancer class - Has special interaction options
  • journal - May appear in the player's journal

Strategy

  • The quest is optional but provides useful rewards
  • Necromancers should consider the domination option which may be easier
  • Prepare for fighting the Treacherous Spirit before accepting
